summary: The Contoso Wireless phone features a 5.7 inch HD+ Infinity Display, an octa-core processor and 4GB of RAM, a 12MP + 5MP dual rear camera and 8MP front camera, a 4,000mAh battery with fast charging capabilities, advanced security features such as facial recognition and an on-device encryption chip, 64GB of internal storage with microSD card support up to 512GB, the latest version of Android OS with regular updates and security patches, a set of earbuds and a protective case, and additional accessories available for purchase.
